snippet: Fears of the Gridlock Games have transformed into complaints about the Ghost Town Olympics as some tourists skip London, bowing to official warnings of stifling overcrowding.
abstract: Tens of thousands of foreign tourists without tickets to the Olympic Games, as well as Britons themselves, appear to have decided to skip London, heading official warnings of stifling overcrowding; low attendance has forced officials to acknowledge that there will be no short-term economic boost from the Games.
lead_paragraph: Fears of the Gridlock Games have transformed into complaints about the Ghost Town Olympics as some tourists skip London, bowing to official warnings of stifling overcrowding.

headline.main: After Warnings of an Olympic Crush, Businesses Suffer in a Deserted London
headline.print_headline: After Warnings of an Olympic Crush, Businesses Suffer in a Deserted London
